Significant risk of spontaneous abortion and risk of many significant anomalies.  
ACE inhibitors May cause kidney damage in the fetus when used in 2nd and 3rd trimester, decrease 
in the amount of amniotic fluid and deformities of face, limbs and lungs.  
Anticoagulants 
Warfarin Use during 1 st trimester produces defects like nasal hypoplasia and a depressed 
nasal bridge; termed as Fetal warfarin Syndrome. Use during 2nd and 3rd trimeste
